text.<b>µTorrent Web is an easy-to-use online: µTorrent Web is an easy-to-use online torrent client that uses your default browser. If you already know where to find your torrent file, you can click on it or drag the torrent into the browser window of µTorrent Web. Alternatively, you can use the search box at the top of the µTorrent Web window to search for a torrent download. If you have the safe torrent scanner installed, which is offered to you shortly after installing µTorrent Web, it helps you find and download torrent files from the search results, meaning you don’t need to visit potentially harmful websites. You can specify the specific hard drive or folder where you want torrents to download. You can also change the default download folder in µTorrent Web's settings. If the file is a video or audio file, you can stream torrent files inside the media player built into your browser based web torrent client.
text.<b>µTorrent Web makes it easy to stream: µTorrent Web makes it easy to stream torrent files. Once installed into your favorite browser, the web torrent client allows you to download any file type into the folder of your choice. However, if the file is audio or video based, you can stream the file within your browser window via the built-in player. Best of all, you don’t need to wait until the file finishes downloading - you can play it near-instantly after the download begins. As you build up your library of downloaded files, you can use µTorrent Web as your preferred media player to stream online torrents.

The best web torrent client for Mac.
